lines.p:
I rejoiced when they said to me:
“Let us go to the house of Jehovah.”
And now our feet are standingWithin your gates, O Jerusalem.
Jerusalem is built as a cityThat is joined together as one.
The tribes have gone up to it,The tribes of Jah,According to the reminder to Israel,To give thanks to the name of Jehovah.
For thrones for judgment were set up there,Thrones of the house of David.

Ask for the peace of Jerusalem.
Those who love you, O city, will be secure.
May peace continue within your ramparts,Security within your fortified towers.

For the sake of my brothers and my companions I will say:
“May there be peace within you.”
For the sake of the house of Jehovah our God,I will seek good for you.
